NOW-1595 -- Form development in progress, updated variables, updated catalog item - picture, short description, meta  AYO GRC  1.Completed Demo of the story : sprint 33 Control referencing field do not populate on control test whether anyone change it in the control  2.Started second story : If control is NA , then need to keep it after the state of control state is changed to closed complete white the operational effectiveness field of the control test is "validated as not acceptable". 3.Completed AC1 : Created the choice "validated as not acceptable " in the choice of the field operational effectiveness in the control test table 4.Changed the Business Rule to not applicable on the two conditions where the status of control is "not acceptable" and operational effectiveness is "Validated as not acceptable".</u_project_work> <u_remarks/> <u_resourse display_value="Amal Madhav">5a8898a98381e650a946f896feaad37d</u_resourse> <u_start_time>2025-03-17 11:00:02</u_start_time> <u_work_hour>4.34</u_work_hour> <u_work_notes/> </u_project_effort> </record_update>
